scripts.dev: nodemon -e "js json graphql" --ignore 'appinfo.json' --exec "node appinfo_tools.js update && node src/server.js"
scripts.dev:start-app: node appinfo_tools.js update && npm run dev:prisma-deploy && node src/cluster.js
scripts.prisma-export: cd src/database && mkdir -p ../../prisma/ && npx prisma export -e ../../.env -p ../../prisma/export_import.zip
scripts.dev:prisma-deploy: npm run dev:generate-docs && cd src/database && npx prisma deploy -e ../../.env && npx prisma generate -e ../../.env
scripts.dev:prisma-deploy-f: npm run dev:generate-docs && cd src/database && npx prisma deploy -f -e ../../.env && npx prisma generate -e ../../.env
scripts.dev:clear: npm run clear && docker-compose -f docker-compose-dev.yml rm -f
scripts.dev:generate-docs: cd ./docs && npx redoc-cli bundle swagger.yml && cd ..
scripts.prod:init: mkdir -p data/config && cp src/config/config_example.js data/config/config.js && cp .env_example .env
scripts.prod:start-app: cd src/database && npx npx prisma deploy && cd .. && node cluster.js
scripts.prod:full-restart: npm run prod:stop && npm run prod:clear && npm run prod:build && npm run prod:up
